fko.chessly.game

Interface GameBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameBoardImpl

    public interface GameBoard
    Interface for a Chessly board.
    Author:
    Frank Kopp (frank@familie-kopp.de)

      • hasSamePosition

        boolean hasSamePosition(GameBoard b)
        Checking if the position of this board is identical to the position of the other board. This does not regard the MoveHistory (incl. no of moves) of the game. Is does regard: - next player - castling rights - en passant rights (and file) FIDE rules: Positions are considered the same if and only if the same player has the move, pieces of the same kind and color occupy the same squares and the possible moves of all the pieces of both players are the same. Thus positions are not the same if: - at the start of the sequence a pawn could have been captured en passant. - a king or rook had castling rights, but forfeited these after moving. The castling rights are lost only after the king or rook is moved.
        Parameters:
        b -
        Returns:
        true when the position is identical according to FIDE rules

      • hasCheck

        boolean hasCheck()
        Returns:
        true if last move put the next player into check

      • hasStaleMate

        boolean hasStaleMate()
        Returns:
        true if last move put the next player into checkmate

      • checkForFreePath

        boolean checkForFreePath(GameMove move)
        Checks if there is another piece between the from field and the to field along the allowed move path.
        Parameters:
        move -
        Returns:
        true if no other piece blocking the way - false otherwise

      • canMoveTo

        boolean canMoveTo(GamePosition from,
                  GamePosition to)
        Checks if a move to a field is possible - is free or occupied by opponent. Does NOT check if pawn can capture forward! Does NOT check if the way to the field is blocked! Does NOT check if this is otherwise a legal move (e.g. King moving into Check)
        Parameters:
        from -
        to -
        Returns:
        true if to field is empty or occupied by opponent - false otherwise

      • isWithinBoard

        boolean isWithinBoard(GamePosition p)
        Parameters:
        p -
        Returns:
        true if still on valid board fields

      • hasEnPassantCapturable

        boolean hasEnPassantCapturable()
        Returns:
        true if we can capture a pawn via en passant

      • getEnPassantCapturable

        GamePosition getEnPassantCapturable()
        Returns:
        the GamePosition where we can capture a pawn via en passant

      • getHalfmoveClock

        int getHalfmoveClock()
        50-moves rule - a game ends remis after 50 move without capture
        Returns:
        the number of half moves since the last capture

      • hasInsufficientMaterial

        boolean hasInsufficientMaterial()
        Returns:
        true if the board has not enough material left to actually force a mate position

      • tooManyMovesWithoutCapture

        boolean tooManyMovesWithoutCapture()
        Returns:
        true if we have more than 100 halfmoves without a capture
